name: 2.2.2.Final
body:
- [**Task**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Change the recent "findLast()" SQL storage query to "findFirst()" and inverting the sort direction [#2361](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2361)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/blocker**] Bug when getting artifact version by content if artifact has multiple versions with identical content [#2357](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2357)
- [**Task**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Remove bi-weekly Quarkus Build [#2338](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2338)
- [**component/registry**][**priority/low**] Test using empty import ZIP as workaround for KafkaSQL bug [#2306](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2306)
- [**Question**] New release plan [#2274](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2274)
- [**Task**][**UI**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Improve UX/messaging for Import/Export in UI [#2259](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2259)
- [**Bug**][**UI**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Cannot navigate/load the Settings page directly [#2258](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2258)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] JSON schema validity checking inconsistent with compatibility checking [#2236](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2236)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Log all 500 errors by default [#2232](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2232)
- [**Enhancement**][**UI**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] UI tweaks for metadata labels [#2231](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2231)
- [**Duplicate**][**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Apply dynamic configuration property logic to Apicurio Registry [#2230](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2230)
- [**Bug**][**UI**][**priority/normal**] None enum value is not present in the UI when configuring an artifact validity or compatibility rules.  [#2173](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2173)
- [**Question**] [Question] Configuring Kafka client authentication settings when using Apache Kafka storage option [#2073](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2073)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Improve Import/Export feature [#1922](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1922)
- [**Bug**][**Documentation**] [Docs] Installing Apicurio Registry using Docker points to the wrong image version [#1918](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1918)
- [**Enhancement**][**Tests**] Stop spawning Keycloak servers for unit tests [#1779](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1779)
- [**Bug**] Protobuf Dependency Management [#1737](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1737)
- [**closed**] Ccompat API is not returning references when fetching a schema by id [#1676](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1676)
- [**Bug**] CCompat Layer the Schema dto is not fully compatible. [#1660](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1660)
- [**Bug**][**2.0.x**] The UI does not properly obey the "disable roles" feature [#1610](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1610)
- [**Bug**] API ccompat v6 not returning artifact [#1593](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1593)
- [**closed**] CI Workflow issue: PR builds not using the right code? [#1513](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1513)
- [**Bug**] io.apicurio.registry.storage.RuleNotFoundException: No rule named 'COMPATIBILITY' was found. [#980](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/980)
- [**Enhancement**][**EPIC**] Support artifact references [#865](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/865)
- [**Bug**] Global compatibility rule execution broken for RuleApplicationType.CREATE [#358](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/358)
